page.title: List of artworks known in English by a foreign title

revision.comment: Disambiguating links to [[Heroic]] (link changed to [[Heroic poetry]]) using [[User:Qwertyytrewqqwerty/DisamAssist|DisamAssist]].
revision.text:
{{incomplete list|date=August 2018}} The following is an alphabetical list of works of art that are often called by a non-English name in an English context. (Of course, many such titles are simply the names of people: ''[[Don Quixote]]'', ''[[Irma la Douce]]'', ''[[Madame Bovary]]'', ''[[Tosca]]'', ''[[PellÃ©as et MÃ©lisande]]''. These have been omitted, as have examples where the English may easily be inferred: ''[[Symphonie fantastique]]'', ''[[Les liaisons dangereuses]]''.)
